intents.response: Hello! I'm Rohan's AI assistant. I can answer questions about his skills, projects, and experience. What would you like to know? (You can also type 'help').
I am a simple AI assistant created by Rohan to answer questions about his professional portfolio. I can tell you about his skills, education, internships, and projects.

You can ask me about the following topics: 
- Skills (or ask about specific languages, frameworks, or tools)
- Projects (or ask about the 'drone', 'skin', or 'downloader' project)
- Education
- Internships
- How to contact him
Rohan has a strong skill set in several areas. I can give you more details on his 'languages', 'frameworks', or 'data science tools'.
He is proficient in several programming languages, including Python for AI/ML, JavaScript for web development (like this portfolio!), and C++/C#.
He has extensive experience with major AI/ML frameworks like TensorFlow, PyTorch, and Keras for building and training deep learning models.
For data science and computer vision, he uses tools like Pandas and NumPy for data manipulation, Scikit-learn for machine learning models, and OpenCV for image processing.
Rohan has worked on several key projects. You can ask for more details about the 'Drone Detection System', the 'Skin Disease Classifier', or the 'AI Image Downloader'.

For the Drone Detection System, Rohan engineered a computer vision pipeline using a Keras-based CNN and OpenCV. It achieved over 85% confidence in real-time, multi-camera object detection and classification.

The Skin Disease Classifier is an AI-powered diagnostic tool. Rohan designed and trained a TensorFlow CNN on over 5,000 images, applying data augmentation to improve the model's accuracy in identifying various skin conditions.
He built a Streamlit application that uses OpenAI's CLIP model for intelligent, content-based bulk image filtering and downloading, moving beyond simple keyword searches.
Rohan is pursuing his Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science at the Thapar Institute of Engineering & Technology in Patiala (2022 - Present).

Rohan has completed two key internships. At Bharat Electronics Limited (BEL), he engineered a defence-grade object detection pipeline (Faster R-CNN) for drone tracking. At Pan India Consultants, he built a C#/.NET serial port communication tool.
You can contact Rohan directly by using the contact form at the bottom of this page. He's always open to discussing new opportunities!
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help. Is there anything else you'd like to know?
